name: RPS Run - Remastered
description:
The Remastered Edition of the Jam Game Rock Paper Scissors Run(https://thatguyesso.itch.io/rock-paper-scissor-run) 

An Endless Runner where the obstacles are beat using the rules of Rock Paper Scissors. Using them correctly and surviving gains you points. 

The game progressively gets more difficult the longer you survive. 

Can you get the highest score?
